>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.qIIoypmTFypnmRer]{Evolutionist Adaption}

Your adaptations are triggered by radiation. You become immune to low and medium level @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#radiation]{Radiation}, and you treat each other category of radiation as one step lower. Additionally, your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.I0pUeDcBsRz6jA7v]{Adaptive Strike (Ex)} gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#irradiate]{Irradiate} critical hit effect.

duration.value: 1 minute. For each additional RP you spend, you can extend this duration by 1 minute.
